MageMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
MageMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

MageMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
MageMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
MageMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

MageMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
MageMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

MageMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
MageMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !MageMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

MageMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
MageMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !MageMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
